name: Grand Demolition Auto
description:
Grand Demolition Auto is an arcade action game in which you demolish buildings to earn precious money and upgrade your Killdozer, all in order to survive! In the future, all property is private property: almost everything you crash into will cost you!

UI Mocks List of features
  • Use the A&D keys to rotate the Killdozer (the yellow square), press W to move forwards, S to move backwards.
  • Crash into the marked buildings (blue squares) to collect the most cash.
  • Crashing into red buildings will lose you money!
  • Crashing into green buildings will give you money, but not as much as a marked building would.
  • Beat the timer to the marked building before it resets!
  • Running out of money loses you the game, but demolishing all the marked buildings will win you the game.
